title: Y Formula | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Herbal formula in a softgel capsule that supports healthy microbial balance.*
cleaned_text: Y Formula [](/products/y-formula) Y Formula Gluten Free [Log in](/account?locale=en) [View full details](/products/y-formula) Herbal blend including oregano, goldenseal, peppermint and support healthy microbial HEALTHY MICROBIAL BALANCE* Herbal blend including and hydrastine 100mg Peppermint (Mentha part) (0.1 mL) 100mg Thyme (Thymus vulgaris) Oil Extract (leaf) ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Y Formula Does Not Contain Gluten Dairy Wheat Other Details UPC: 871791002654 SKU: 78289 DIRECTIONS Y Formula Directions and/or DosageAdults swallow 2 softgels between meals twice daily, or as recommended by a healthcare professional. Do not chew. WarningDo not use if you are pregnant or nursing. If you have diabetes, or are taking any medications, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight. INTERACTIONS FAQS A: Generally, women age 25-45 have the greatest concern about supporting healthy yeast balance; however, men are affected by this issue as well. Anyone looking for a natural, systemic cleanse to support healthy yeast balance may be interested in Y Formula. A: It may. Some experts believe that yeast balance issues may lead to over-consumption of refined sugars and carbohydrates, which simply compounds the issue. By balancing yeast, along with regular exercise and a healthy diet, you may find those cravings reduced, with the added potential benefit of weight loss as well.
